saltRounds.description: The number of rounds performed when generating a password hash

failsUntilTemporaryLock.description: The number of failed login attempts allowed before the account is locked for a short period of time

failsUntilPermanentLock.description: The number of failed login attempts allowed before the account is permanently locked

temporaryLockDuration.description: The amount of time a locked user must wait before attempting to log in again

resetTokenLifespan.description: The amount of time a password reset token remains valid for

inviteTokenLifespan.description: The amount of time an invite password reset token remains valid for

passwordMustHaveNumber.description: Whether the password must contain at least one number

passwordMustHaveUppercase.description: Whether the password must contain at least one uppercase character

passwordMustHaveLowercase.description: Whether the password must contain at least one lowercase character

passwordMustHaveSpecial.description: Whether the password must contain at least one special character
